DOC.brief_summary: Chronic pain affect life quality . This study perform first time Mashhad.The purpose present study examine effect acupuncture life quality 150 patient suffer chronic pain . Some people like perform acupuncture believe 's free risk beneficial . In order achieve purpose , examine life quality patient acupuncture . This study randomly perform 150 patient age 17-75 . They suffer chronic pain . The questionnaire base WHO QOL . The questionnaire fill acupuncture 12 week .
DOC.brief_title: Quality Life Acupuncture Chronic Pain : A Randomized Study Before After Performing
DOC.criteria: age 17 75 year old , suffer arthritis pain , migraine backache , muscular spasm , pain neck , knee duration disease 1 year tack pain relief pregnant woman
